intro: Unleash chaos and blast endless waves of evil emojis in this wild FPS!
description: IF YOU EVER WANT TO SHOOT HORDES OF EMOJIS? RIGHT INTO THEIR FACES? THAN THIS IS YOUR GAME BUDDY! KILL THE EMOJI is a fast-paced, bombastic, funny and hard survival first-person shooter. Kill as much emojis as you can, try to save the world, but the waves will never end! Enjoy our game while you can let off your infinite pain over the Emoji Movie or your hate for the color yellow. But this game is so universal, basically, everyone can join the fight against the evil emojis! So what are you waiting for? Have fun playing our games you lovely silly humans!
